info.name: Google - Anime Rain Theme
info.description:
Just turn everything to cyan and water drop. Maybe not good looking for some people.
Just comment if there is a bug.
Miku image from the internet(So Cute!!)

Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
You can change rainbow text on the bottom of the screen.
*All images are from the internet!
Ver 1.2
By SPdream
